reward_output:
The user's goal is to block the number '12345*' in Simple SMS Messenger.
The user has opened the app and clicked on the settings icon.
The screenshot shows the settings page.
To achieve the goal, the user needs to click on "Manage blocked numbers".
The screenshot shows the "Manage blocked numbers" option.
However, the user has only navigated to the settings page. They have not yet clicked on "Manage blocked numbers" and added the number to the block list.
Therefore, the user has not yet achieved their goal.

Reason:The user has navigated to the settings page, but has not yet clicked on "Manage blocked numbers" to add the number to the block list.
